snippet.title: TOP 20 AMBER FOUGERE FRAGRANCES | Warm, Spicy, Aromatic Lavender With Vanilla, Amber + More
snippet.description:
TOP 20 AMBER FOUGERE FRAGRANCES | Warm, Spicy, Aromatic Lavender With Vanilla, Amber + More
➡️ Get $30 From RAKUTEN: https://www.rakuten.com/r/MANLOV43?eeid=28187
➡️ Buy Perfumes @ Twisted Lily: https://tidd.ly/3xxJ7lc 10% off Code: PERFUMEGUY10
➡️ Buy Perfumes At So-Avant-Garde: https://so-avant-garde.com/ Use my 20% Off Code: Sebastian20
➡️ Buy Perfumes At ZGO: https://www.zgoperfumery.com 15% off Discount Code: PERFUMEGUY
➡️ Buy Perfumes At Luckyscent: https://www.luckyscent.com 10% off Discount Code: 10JARA
FOLLOW ME ⬇️⬇️⬇️
🔴 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/theperfumeguy/
🔵 Non-Perfume Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jaraseb/
🔴 Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/ThePerfumeGuy
✅ Join My Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/lookingfeelingsmelling/

📌 Send me questions to LFSGQUESTIONS@GMAIL.COM 📌

TOP 20 AMBER FOUGERE FRAGRANCES | Warm, Spicy, Aromatic Lavender With Vanilla, Amber + More

Fougere Fragrances, Barbershop Fragrances composed with Warm, Vanillic, Ambery Notes? Yes, this is the list for this particular Style of Fragrance. Warm Spicy compositions for when it's cold outside but Barbershop Fragrances at the same time. I have 20 on the list, with some bonuses that didn't make the list and it's a ranked list. Do you enjoy Amber Fougere Fragrances? Do you like the Fragrances on this list? And am I missing any that you are a fan of that's not featured on the list? Please let me know, add a comment below so that I can find out. 

00:00 Intro
01:41 LANCOME HYPNOSE HOMME: Cardamom, Amber, Lavender, Mint, Patchouli, Musk, Bergamot
02:30 PRADA AMBER POUR HOMME: Saffron, Neroli, Myrrh, Musk, Orange Blossom, Vanilla, Labdanum, Tonka Beans
03:38 MAUBOUSSIN POUR HOMME: Lavender, Vanilla, Cinnamon, Sandalwood, Patchouli, Sage, 
04:17 JACQUES BOGART BOGART POUR HOMME: Tonka Beans, Lavender, Orange Blossom, Bergamot, Patchouli, Cedar, Oakmoss, Musk, Rose
05:13 IMAGINARY AUTHORS TELEGRAMA: Lavender, Talc, Vanilla, Amyris, Linen, Teak Wood, Pepper
05:58 CARON POUR UN HOMME DE CARON: Lavender, Vanilla, Musk
07:02 LALIQUE POUR HOMME: Lavender, Cedar, Iris, Rosemary, Oakmoss, Vanilla, Amber, Patchouli
07:43 JEAN PAUL GAULTIER LE MALE: Vanilla, Tonka Beans, Cinnamon, Lavender, Mint, Orange Blossom
08:37 AMOUAGE ENCLAVE: https://tidd.ly/2SfpjTN
Notes: Mint, Cardamom, Cinnamon, Pink Pepper, Olibanum, Patchouli, Vetiver, Amber Xtreme, Labdanum
09:31 PARFUMS DE MARLY PEGASUS: https://tidd.ly/3naKnHz
Notes: Vanilla, Bitter Almonds, Sandalwood, Heliotrope, Lavender, Amber
10:25 HISTOIRES DE PARFUMS 1725 CASANOVA: https://tidd.ly/33fAwZE
Notes: Lavender, Vanilla, Almonds, Licorice, Amber
11:40 MOLINARD LAVANDE: Lavender, Clary Sage, Vanilla, Benzoin, Tonka Beans, Labdanum
12:39 GUERLAIN HERITAGE: Sandalwood, Patchouli, Lavender, Amber, Aldehydes, Juniper Berries
13:27 AMOUAGE SUNSHINE MAN: https://tidd.ly/3mUJUZL
Notes: Lavender, Tonka Beans, Brandy, Vanilla, Immortelle, Orange, Juniper Berries, Clary Sage
14:35 CARTIER PASHA DE CARTIER PARFUM: Sandalwood, Liquor, Balsam Fir, Tonka Bean, Benzoin, Ambrocenide, Labdanum
15:27 ROJA PARFUMS DANGER POUR HOMME: https://tidd.ly/3gxk6Pi
Notes: Lavender, Ambergris, Woods, Patchouli, Cumin, Oakmoss, Vanilla
16:14 NILAFAR DU NIL NILUFER: Vanilla, Almonds, Lavender, Hazelnuts, Heliotrope, Cinnamon, Cedar, Myrrh, Geranium
17:25 XERJOFF NAXOS: https://tidd.ly/2TnZ6mF
Notes: Bergamot, Lemon, Lavender, Cinnamon, Honey, Cashmere, Tobacco leaf, Tonka beans, Vanilla
18:06 EIGHT & BOB EGYPT: https://tidd.ly/3A4TYUZ
Notes: Lavender, Nutmeg, Patchouli, Cardamom, Sandalwood, Oakmoss
18:49 BONUS Scents: 
JOVOY L'ART DE LA GUERRE: Leather, Oakmoss, Rhubarb, Lavender, Immortelle, Nutmeg
DIOR EAU NOIRE: Lavender, Licorice, Coffee, Vanilla, Thyme, Immortelle, Violet, Leather
INEKE FIELD NOTES FROM PARIS: Tobacco, Tonka Beans, Beeswax, Coriander, Vanilla
DIOR FEVE DELICIEUSE: Tonka Beans, Vanilla, Caramel, Dark Chocolate, Cherry, Benzoin
21:35 LE GALION SPECIAL FOR GENTLEMEN: Lavender, Opoponax, Oakmoss, Vanilla, Cinnamon, Amber, Citron, Labdanum

Disclaimer: As always please watch, rate, comment, and share this video and please subscribe to my channel https://goo.gl/xWnYzi if you haven't yet. Please stay tuned for more videos and giveaways soon! The views and opinions for the Amber Fougere Fragrances are all my own. If you're curious to try Amber Fougere Fragrances please buy or obtain samples/decants prior to purchasing a full bottle. Fragrances I like you might not like and vice versa, so I cannot guarantee you will react to the Fragrances I discuss on the channel as I have. I may earn a small commission when you use one of the links to make a purchase. Thank you. 

▶️ Perfume Concentration Guide Video EDC, EDT, EDP + EXTRAIT https://youtu.be/miVNbdTvbm0

#ThePerfumeGuy #AmberFougere #FougereFragrances

✅ Latest Video: https://youtu.be/-6ZBBT6Q0vA
